title: Bloomberg Markets:  ICSC’s McGee Bullish on Retail
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets:  ICSC’s McGee Bullish on Retail
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Thomas McGee President/CEO International Council of Shopping Centers (ICSC) Discussing the transformation in retail as younger consumers choose experiences over goods.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
